answers.answer: How far along are you and have they started any medication??

Listen to ur Dr! Do everything he/she says. They will take care of you. I'm 36 weeks today and will be having a csec next week when he gets full term. Just spent a few hours in L&D getting checked out due to high bp out of control on 90mg of meds. Switching meds starting today and crossing fingersit works... Have been feeling like crap. Mine started at 28 weeks.

question: Anny tips plz.... my baby weight is low ......worried,...... bp too hhigh!!!!!!
title: Preeclampsia
